Windrunner.description: Protectors who fly and stick things together. Focus: Combat & Mobility.

Lightweaver.description: Spies and artists who create illusions. Focus: Stealth & versatility.

Skybreaker.description: Law-bringers who command justice through Division. Focus: Damage & Justice.

Edgedancer.description: Dancers who glide and heal. Focus: Support & Evasion.

Elsecaller.description: Scholars who Soulcast and teleport. Focus: Versatility & Intelligence.
